    • #The Night Ghost

    The Night Ghost

      2. The bungler in the grip of the demon held
      3. To his crypt by strange means is compelled
      4. And sleeping as a corpse in darkness rotting
      5. He dreams forth the red eyed thing
      6. So rises from the sleeper’s breath
      7. Comes the Night Ghost — who brings death!
      2. The Night Ghost climbs, as a shadow leaping, overtop the manor wall
      3. And through an open window goes, as a chilling fog
      4. To the room of the sleeper he creeps
      5. And as a swarm of bugs, overtop her stomach crawls
      6. And on her chest, as a choking darkness sits
      1. ‘Til she wakes with a gasp
      2. The Night Ghost; by the window watching, giant as a shadow standing
      3. She claps <clap sound effect> turning on the light
      4. And The Night Ghost, as the darkness in the day, vanishes from all sight.
